Ability - Insight #21

Change fatigue is setting in

We believe...

We’re changing our approach and trying to fix our tools, some people are getting tired and frustrated because it adds to their confusion and their workload
It’s a barrier to overcome in the future

Because we've seen and heard...

"I’ve cut 92 columns to 12… Much of it is not needed"

People expressing frustrations about tools and processes:
- 4 different registers in 2 years
- Same spreadsheet, looks better, same problems
- Don't have all the category owners yet - that sits with group risk and has been going for the last 2 years
